positions.subtitle: Archer and Bull
positions.description: *Responsible to manage Client accounts, understand the hiring needs and getting the roles activated with the internal consultants. * Ensure quality checks and other deliverables are met.*Responsible for execution of mandates (Leadership roles, Mid senior level positions and niche mandates) for clients across sectors like Retail, E-commerce, Fintech & Technology, Government, specialized manufacturing etc.* Responsible for end-to-end recruitment (i.e., candidate mapping, sourcing, initial screening on calls, coordinating interviews, salary negotiation, offer roll outs, and onboarding) at all levels. * Expertise in sourcing candidates from LinkedIn, Naukri, Naukri gulf, Referrals, ATS, Competitor Analysis, and X-Ray search. * Performing research work (industry mapping) on mandates for appropriate screening of candidates in accordance with the requirement.* Pitch preparation of the role and the client.* Interactions with multiple nationalities including Indians, Arabic, and Europeans.* Negotiate the salary structure as per the client's budget.* Preparing recruitment status reports for clients whenever required. * Managing relationships with various internal and external stakeholders, which involves KAMs, Team    Leads and Candidates and clients.
positions.title: Talent Consultant
positions.description_html:
*Responsible to manage Client accounts, understand the hiring needs and getting the roles activated with the internal consultants.
* Ensure quality checks and other deliverables are met.
*Responsible for execution of mandates (Leadership roles, Mid senior level positions and niche mandates) for clients across sectors like Retail, E-commerce, Fintech & Technology, Government, specialized manufacturing etc.
* Responsible for end-to-end recruitment (i.e., candidate mapping, sourcing, initial screening on calls, coordinating interviews, salary negotiation, offer roll outs, and onboarding) at all levels.
* Expertise in sourcing candidates from LinkedIn, Naukri, Naukri gulf, Referrals, ATS, Competitor Analysis, and X-Ray search.
* Performing research work (industry mapping) on mandates for appropriate screening of candidates in accordance with the requirement.
* Pitch preparation of the role and the client.
* Interactions with multiple nationalities including Indians, Arabic, and Europeans.
* Negotiate the salary structure as per the client's budget.
* Preparing recruitment status reports for clients whenever required.
* Managing relationships with various internal and external stakeholders, which involves KAMs, Team
Leads and Candidates and clients.

positions.subtitle: Archer and Bull
positions.description: * Responsible for execution of mandates (Leadership roles, Mid senior level positions and niche mandates) for clients across sectors like Retail, Fintech & Technology, Hospitality, Real Estate, e-commerce, Government, Oil & Gas, and FMCG.* Responsible for end-to-end recruitment (i.e., candidate mapping, sourcing, screening, coordinating interviews, salary negotiation, offer roll outs, and onboarding) at all levels. * Expertise in sourcing candidates from LinkedIn, Naukri, Naukri gulf, Referrals, ATS, Competitor Analysis, and X-Ray search. * Performing research work on mandates for appropriate screening of candidates in accordance with the requirement.* Pitch preparation of the role and the client.* Interactions with multiple nationalities including Indian, Arabic, and European candidates. * Negotiate the salary structure as per the client's budget.* Preparing recruitment status reports for clients whenever required. * Managing relationships with various internal and external stakeholders, which involves KAMs, Team    Leads and Candidates.
positions.title: Executive Headhunter
positions.description_html:
* Responsible for execution of mandates (Leadership roles, Mid senior level positions and niche mandates) for clients across sectors like Retail, Fintech & Technology, Hospitality, Real Estate, e-commerce, Government, Oil & Gas, and FMCG.
* Responsible for end-to-end recruitment (i.e., candidate mapping, sourcing, screening, coordinating interviews, salary negotiation, offer roll outs, and onboarding) at all levels.
* Expertise in sourcing candidates from LinkedIn, Naukri, Naukri gulf, Referrals, ATS, Competitor Analysis, and X-Ray search.
* Performing research work on mandates for appropriate screening of candidates in accordance with the requirement.
* Pitch preparation of the role and the client.
* Interactions with multiple nationalities including Indian, Arabic, and European candidates.
* Negotiate the salary structure as per the client's budget.
* Preparing recruitment status reports for clients whenever required.
* Managing relationships with various internal and external stakeholders, which involves KAMs, Team
Leads and Candidates.

experience.title: Human Resources Intern
experience.description: Effectively managed LinkedIn Recruitment process and HR related responsibilities like salary slips, attendance review, offer letters, contacting placement officers, drafting emails and conducting interviews.
